targets.query:
from(bucket: "default")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "window-multi-rf" and (r._field == "ground_truth" or r._field == "output_binary"))
  |> keep(columns: ["_time", "_value", "_field"])
  |> pivot(rowKey:["_time"], columnKey: ["_field"], valueColumn: "_value")
  |> group(columns: ["ground_truth"])
  |> rename(columns: {"output_binary": "ground_truth -"})

panels.description: Each table represents each ground truth in the measurement

targets.query:
from(bucket: "default")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "window-multi-rf" and (r._field == "ground_truth" or r._field == "output_binary"))
  |> keep(columns: ["_time", "ip_src_addr", "ip_dst_addr", "_value", "_field", "ip_src_port", "ip_dst_port"])
  |> pivot(rowKey:["_time"], columnKey: ["_field"], valueColumn: "_value")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r.output_binary == 1)
  |> group(columns: ["ground_truth"])

panels.title: Output Binary = 1

panels.title: Total of packets with output_binary = 1 per ground_truth

targets.query:
from(bucket: "default")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "window-multi-rf" and (r._field == "ground_truth" or r._field == "output_binary"))
  |> keep(columns: ["_time", "_value", "_field"])
  |> pivot(rowKey:["_time"], columnKey: ["_field"], valueColumn: "_value")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r.output_binary == 0)
  |> group(columns: ["ground_truth"])
  |> rename(columns: {"output_binary": "ground_truth -"})

panels.title: Total of packets with output_binary = 0 per ground_truth

targets.query:
from(bucket: "default")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "window-multi-rf" and (r._field == "ip_data_size" or r._field == "tcp_data_size"))
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({ r with _value: float(v: r._value) }))
  |> pivot(rowKey:["_time"], columnKey: ["_field"], valueColumn: "_value")
  |> keep(columns: ["ip_data_size", "tcp_data_size"])

panels.title: Histogram IP Data Size && TCP Data Size

targets.query:

  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "window-multi-rf")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._field == "ip_data_size")
  |> keep(columns: ["_value"])
  |> max()

  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "window-multi-rf")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._field == "tcp_data_size")
  |> keep(columns: ["_value"])
  |> max()

  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "window-multi-rf")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._field == "ip_data_size")
  |> keep(columns: ["_value"])
  |> min()

from(bucket: "default")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "window-multi-rf")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._field == "tcp_data_size")
  |> keep(columns: ["_value"])
  |> mean()

  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "window-multi-rf")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._field == "ip_data_size")
  |> keep(columns: ["_value"])

  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "window-multi-rf")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._field == "tcp_data_size")
  |> keep(columns: ["_value"])

from(bucket: "default")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "window-multi-rf" and r._field == "ip_data_size")
  |> group(columns: ["ip_src_addr", "ip_dst_addr"])
  |> mean()

from(bucket: "default")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "window-multi-rf" and r._field == "tcp_data_size")
  |> group(columns: ["ip_src_addr", "ip_dst_addr"])
  |> mean()

  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "window-multi-rf" and (r._field == "ip_data_size" or r._field == "ground_truth"))
  |> pivot(rowKey:["_time"], columnKey: ["_field"], valueColumn: "_value")
  |> group(columns: ["ip_src_port", "ip_dst_port", "ip_src_addr", "ip_dst_addr", "ground_truth"])
  |> mean(column: "ip_data_size")
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({ ip_data_size: r.ip_data_size, ip_port: r.ip_src_port + " -> " +  r.ip_dst_port, ip_pair: r.ip_src_addr + " -> " +  r.ip_dst_addr, ground__truth: r.ground_truth}))

panels.title: More info: TCP + IP pair + Port pair + Ground truth

targets.query:
from(bucket: "default")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "window-multi-rf" and r._field == "window_pkt_count")
  |> group(columns: ["_time", "ip_dst_addr", "ip_src_addr"])
  |> sum()
  |> rename(columns: {"ip_src_addr": "_src", "ip_dst_addr": "dst"})
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({ time: r._time, "_src": r._src, dst: r.dst, "": r._value}))

from(bucket: "default")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "window-multi-rf" and r._field == "window_pkt_count")
  |> group(columns: ["ip_src_addr", "ip_dst_addr"])
  |> sum()
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({ packets: r._value, _field: r.ip_src_addr + " -> " +  r.ip_dst_addr}))

from(bucket: "default")
|> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
|> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "window-multi-rf" and r._field == "window_pkt_count")
|> group(columns: ["ip_src_addr"])
|> sum()
|> map(fn: (r) => ({ packets: r._value, _field: r.ip_src_addr}))

from(bucket: "default")
|> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
|> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "window-multi-rf" and r._field == "window_pkt_count")
|> group(columns: ["ip_dst_addr"])
|> sum()
|> map(fn: (r) => ({ packets: r._value, _field: r.ip_dst_addr }))

panels.description: Limit to ports with more than 30 packets

targets.query:
from(bucket: "default")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "window-multi-rf" and r._field == "window_pkt_count")
  |> group(columns: ["ip_src_port", "ip_dst_port"])
  |> sum()
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._value > 30)
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({ ip_data_size: r._value, ip_port: r.ip_src_port + " -> " +  r.ip_dst_port}))

panels.title: Port pair (src -> dst)

panels.description: Limit to ports with more than 30 packets

|> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
|> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "window-multi-rf" and r._field == "window_pkt_count")

panels.title: IP Source Port

panels.description: Limit to ports with more than 30 packets

targets.query:
from(bucket: "default")
|> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
|> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "window-multi-rf" and r._field == "window_pkt_count")
|> group(columns: ["ip_dst_port"])

panels.title: IP Destination Port

targets.query:
from(bucket: "default")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "window-multi-rf" and r._field == "window_pkt_count")
  |> duplicate(column: "_value", as: "value")
  |> keep(columns: ["_value", "value"])
  |> group(columns: ["value"])
  |> count()
  |> rename(columns: {"_value": ""})

from(bucket: "default")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "window-multi-rf" and (r._field == "window_pkt_count" or r._field == "ground_truth"))
  |> pivot(rowKey:["_time"], columnKey: ["_field"], valueColumn: "_value")
  |> group(columns: ["ip_src_port", "ip_dst_port", "ip_src_addr", "ip_dst_addr", "ground_truth"])
  |> sum(column:"window_pkt_count")
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({ packets: r.window_pkt_count, ip_port: r.ip_src_port + " -> " +  r.ip_dst_port, ip_pair: r.ip_src_addr + " -> " +  r.ip_dst_addr, ground__truth: r.ground_truth}))

panels.title: More info: IP pair + Port pair + Ground truth

targets.query:
from(bucket: "default")
|> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
|> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "window-multi-rf")
|> pivot(rowKey:["_time"], columnKey: ["_field"], valueColumn: "_value")
|> map(fn: (r) => ({ time: r._time, "window_avg_pkt_size": r.window_avg_pkt_size, window_inter_arrival_avg: r.window_inter_arrival_avg, dst: r.ip_dst_addr, src: r.ip_src_addr}))
